import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import Contact from './Contact' import BubbleChat from './BubbleChat' import MyProfile from './MyProfile' import SendBox from './SendBox' import $ from 'jquery' function ChatPage ({ chatList, setCurrentChatList, loginStatus, setLoginStatus, currentUser, userImage, displayName, contacts, setContacts, currentChat, setCurrentChat }) { const [currentPicture, setCurrentPicture] = useState('logo.jpg') const navigate = useNavigate() useEffect(() => { if (loginStatus === false) { navigate('/') } // Add any initial contacts here if needed }, []) const logOut = event => { setCurrentChat('') setCurrentPicture('') setCurrentChatList([]) setLoginStatus(false) navigate('/') } const addContact = name => { for (var i = 0; i < currentUser.contacts.length; i++) { if (currentUser.contacts[i].name === name) { alert('Contact already exist!') $('#contactName').val('') return } } const newContact = { picture: 'logo.jpg', name: name, lastMessage: 'no message yet', lastSeen: 'now', chatList: [] // Create an empty chat list for the new contact } setContacts(prevContacts => [...prevContacts, newContact]) if (currentUser.contacts.length == 0) { currentUser.contacts = [newContact] } else { currentUser.contacts.push(newContact) } $('#contactName').val('') } return ( <>
{contacts.map((contact, index) => ( ))}
Add Contact
{currentChat}
{chatList.map(chat => ( ))}
) } export default ChatPage
